recipe.title: Irish Oatmeal

meta.comment: I don't know how Irish this is, but it's how I prepare steel-cut oats for oatmeal. Using the sourdough starter makes it ferment slightly and pick up a more complex flavour.

steps.step: Combine all ingredients in a 2-L pot. Cover and let sit overnight.
To cook, bring to a boil, then cook 5 minutes while stirring.
Turn off heat, cover, and let sit 60 minutes.

recipe.storage: Store leftover servings in the refrigerator. Use a microwave to reheat.
